title: Timpanogos Cave National Monument: People
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People               People         The Timpanogos Cave Committee sponsored the building of the trail to the caves which workers "carved" out of the cliffside. NPS  From early peoples through cave discoverers to today's visitor, people have played many roles in the story of Timpanogos Cave National Monument. Early Peoples  Explorers, Trappers and Mapmakers  Pioneers, Miners and Loggers  Cave Discoverers
